channel.title: My shop doesent work =/

item.title: My shop doesent work =/
item.dc:creator: @plowking321 plowking321
item.description:
@plowking321 wrote:

Well i’ve programmed a donator shop. But when i trade the shopkeeper no items come up.

Here are my codes:

case 9: // Shop Case //isGeneral = false; p.getActionSender().sendString("Donator shop", 620, 22); shopopen(p, 9); items = GameEngine.shops.Donator; itemsN = GameEngine.shops.DonatorN; p.getActionSender().sendItems( -1, 64209, 93, p.getInventory().getContainer());//Shop Inventory p.getActionSender().sendItems( -1, 63746, 556, items, itemsN); break; }

break; case 9: switch (buttonId2) {//Donator case 0:return 1038; case 1:return 1040; case 2:return 1042; case 3:return 1044; case 4:return 1046; case 5:return 1048; case 6:return 13884; case 7:return 13890; case 8:return 13896; case 9:return 13902; case 10:return 1053; case 11:return 1055; case 12:return 1057; case 13:return 1050; case 14:return 9084; case 15:return 9096; case 16:return 9097; case 17:return 9098; case 18:return 9099; case 19:return 9100; case 20:return 9101; case 21:return 9102; case 22:return 9104; case 23:return 1052; case 24:return 6568; }

case 1699: GameEngine.shopHandler.openshop(p, 9); break;

If there’s anything wrong with this code, can anyone tell me?

Read full topic
